content: {"Name": "Unity on the Move Troy", "Entity_Id": 3795, "Category": "Mobile Food Resources", "Subcategory": "Mobile Food Pantry", "Organization": "Unity House of Troy", "More_Information": "Available items: fresh produce, meats, grains, dairy\r\nPlease check Unity House's Facebook and Instagram for cancellations", "Counties": ["Rensselaer"], "Location": "Unity House's Kathryn Allen Building", "Address": "102nd Street & 2nd Avenue", "City": "Troy", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12180", "Phone": "5182742607", "Hours_of_Operation": "1st and 3rd Thursday 10am-12pm", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "https://www.unityhouseny.org/services/community-resources/", "Coalition": 1, "CFAN": 1, "Latitude": "42.756247511483885", "Longitude": "-73.68166622688989", "Last_Updated": "08-09-2024", "icon": "marker-414243", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
